name: EVENTup, Inc.
description: Developer of an online cross-city event venue searching platform designed to connect property owners and clients directly. The company's online platform offers an online marketplace for thousands of event venues across the U.S. including galleries, lofts, warehouses, banquet halls, rooftop bars and conference centers, enabling restaurants and other venues operators to streamline their event sales and management workflow, from initial inquiry through day-of execution, simplifying event planning for venues and their customers.
one_liner: Developer of an online cross-city event venue searching platform designed to connect property owners and clients directly. The company's online platform offers an online marketplace for thousands of event venues across the U.S. including galleries, lofts, warehouses, banquet halls, rooftop bars and conference centers, enabling restaurants and other venues operators to streamline their event sales and management workflow, from initial inquiry through day-of execution, simplifying event planning for venues and their customers.
